};

# Watching stories

During development you may want to watch stories for automatically add/remove in entrypoint.

In this case you can use `watchStories` function in your bundler config file:

```js
import { emitStoriesEntrypoint, watchStories } from '@krutoo/showcase/build';

const config = {
  filename: './.generated/found-stories.js',
};

await emitStoriesEntrypoint(config);

if (isDevMode) {
  watchStories(config);
}

export default {
  // ...bundler config
};
```
